product_name: Big Agnes Triple Core Air Pad - Long Wide - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With 4.25 in. of thickness, this 4-season pad combines a layer of closed-cell foam on top of an air chamber, making it a great winter camping companion or just a comfy choice for car-camping trips.
short_description: With 4.25 in. of thickness, this 4-season pad combines a layer of closed-cell foam on top of an air chamber, making it a great winter camping companion or just a comfy choice for car-camping trips.
